item.title: .NET Hot Reload Support via CLI
item.description: Last week, our blog post and the removal of the Hot Reload capability from the .NET SDK repo led to a lot of feedback from the community. First and foremost, we want to apologize. We made a mistake in executing on our decision and took longer than expected to respond back to the community.
item.author: (Scott Hunter)

item.title: Raspberry Pi 3 Fastboot - Less Than 2 Seconds
item.description: This post tells about my journey on fast-booting a Raspberry Pi 3 (RPI). In addition to that, some optimizations are discussed that can be applied to a Qt (QML) application. At the end, we will have a RPI that boots from power-up to Linux shell in 1.75 seconds, power-up to Qt (QML) application in 2.82 seconds.
item.author: (Yazar|Author : Furkan Tokaç)

item.title: RSS is Wonderful · Quakkels.com
item.description: Inspired by Web Rings from the 90s, I created a tool for serendipitous discovery of blogs called RSS Discovery Engine. Similar to how web rings work, I make the assumption that interesting blogs will tend to link to other related blogs, and therefore, linked blogs are likely to also be interesting.
item.author: (Brandon Quakkelaar)
